STM: Struggled with Introduction to Computer Science, questioning career choice.
Felt overwhelmed by college workload, particularly with coding assignments.
MTM: Adapting to the academic rigor of college, focusing on computer science.
Building foundational knowledge in tech, facing challenges in understanding coding languages.
LTM: Transitioned from high school to college with a focus on technology and blockchain.
Pursuing a path in the tech industry, particularly interested in emerging technologies.

Join a coding club or student group to enhance practical skills

long_term: Develop a strong foundation in blockchain and Web3 technologies.
Secure internships or job opportunities in tech startups or established companies.

STM: Felt disconnected from high school friends due to new life changes.
Made new friends in college, finding solace in shared experiences.
MTM: Formed initial connections with classmates, navigating social dynamics in a new environment.
Explored independence, adjusting to dorm life and new social circles.
LTM: Moved away from home, starting the journey of independence and self-discovery.
Exploring new relationships, balancing between old and new social ties.

Strengthen relationships with new friends through shared activities

long_term: Develop a balanced personal life, maintaining connections with both old and new friends.
Form meaningful relationships that support personal growth and career aspirations.

Missed home-cooked meals, adjusting to dining hall food.

LTM: Transitioned from a structured home life to college independence, impacting health routines.
Struggled with balancing health with the demands of college life.

Improve sleep hygiene by establishing a sleep schedule

long_term: Achieve sustainable physical and mental well-being, balancing academic and personal life.
Develop a lifestyle that supports long-term health goals.
